#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define modulus 10000007
ll modular_pow(ll exponent,ll base)
{
    ll result = 1;
    while (exponent > 0)
    {
        if (exponent % 2 == 1)
            result = (result * base) % modulus;
        exponent = exponent >> 1;
        base = (base * base) % modulus;
    }
    return result;
}

int main()
{
	ll t,n,ans;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		if(n%2==0)
	 	ans=modular_pow(n,2)+1;
		else
		ans=modular_pow(n,2)-1;
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
